english: 1. Requirement Gathering – Understanding your business needs.
2. Planning – Finalizing scope, features, and timelines.
3. UI/UX Design – Creating wireframes and modern user interface.
4. Development – Backend, frontend, and full functionality.
5. Testing – QA, bug fixing, and performance optimization.
6. Deployment – Publish on server, app store, or cloud.
7. Support & Maintenance – Ongoing updates and improvements.
urdu: 1. Requirement Gathering – Aapke business ki needs samajhna.
2. Planning – Scope, features aur timeline final karna.
3. UI/UX Design – Wireframes aur modern design banana.
4. Development – Backend aur frontend tayyar karna.
5. Testing – Bugs fix karna aur quality ensure karna.
6. Deployment – Server, app store ya cloud par launch karna.
7. Support & Maintenance – Future updates aur support.
